versionInfo.description: Versions of schema and label files as string

schema.description: string containing version of schema used for validation

labelFile.description: string containing version of label file

start.description: configured start frame or time within media file

end.description: configured end frame or time within media file

skip.description: configured frame or time skip within media file (DEPRECATED)

intervals.description: analyzed frames or time stamps within media file

url.description: url pointing to the media file

duration.description: duration of mediafile in seconds, -1 if not applicable

framerate.description: framerate of media file, -1 if not applicable

width.description: spatial horizontal resolution, -1 if not applicable

height.description: spatial vertical resolution, -1 if not applicable

url.description: url pointing to the calibration file
url pointing to the odometry file

positionInfo.description: details about corresponding position data file, e.g. GPS

url.description: url pointing to the position file

metaInfo.description: array of attributes valid for parts of or the entire media file

uuid.description: 36-hex-digit uuid string containing dashes, i. e. 8-4-4-4-12

history.description: tracks the history of an attribute or object

relation.description: relations from an object to other or objects

temporalValidity.description: temporal validity of an object or attribute

coordinateSystem.description: coordinates are stated relative to this coordinate system

coordinateSystem2D.description: 2D coordinate system given by a 2D translation and a scalar rotation

shape.description: defines different shapes of an object

object.description: defines one object to be labeled

relations.description: relations of this object to other objects
